languages.text: Leman Russ tank takes no damage, except from anti-tank charges. It can not be healed, gain temporary wounds, recieve additional turns and is immune to most effects.

traits.locale_text: Leman Russ tank takes no damage, except from anti-tank charges. It can not be healed, gain temporary wounds, recieve additional turns and is immune to most effects.

languages.text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).
languages.original_text: Только {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}противотанковый заряд{/g} способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} танку "Леман Расс". Получив повреждения, танк не может восстановить целостность корпуса. Танк не может получать {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительные ходы{/g}, а также невосприимчив к большинству эффектов (позитивных и негативных).

traits.locale_text: Only {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Charge{/g} can deal damage to Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain temporary wounds and extra turns. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

languages.text: Только {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}противотанковый заряд{/g} способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} танку "Леман Расс". Получив повреждения, танк не может восстановить целостность корпуса. Танк не может получать {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительные ходы{/g}, а также невосприимчив к большинству эффектов (позитивных и негативных).
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

languages.text: Yalnızca {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Tanksavar Top Mermileri{/g}, Leman Russ muharebe tankına {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verebilir. Bir kez hasar aldığında yapısal bütünlük eski hâline getirilemez. Tank, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı ve {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanamaz. (Olumlu veya olumsuz) çoğu etkiye karşı bağışıktır.
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: Yalnızca {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Tanksavar Top Mermileri{/g}, Leman Russ muharebe tankına {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verebilir. Bir kez hasar aldığında yapısal bütünlük eski hâline getirilemez. Tank, {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı ve {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanamaz. (Olumlu veya olumsuz) çoğu etkiye karşı bağışıktır.

languages.text: Solo un {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}obús antitanque{/g} puede infligir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al tanque de batalla Leman Russ. Una vez dañado, su integridad no puede restablecerse. El tanque no puede ganar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}. Es inmune a la mayoría de los efectos (tanto positivos como negativos).
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: Solo un {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}obús antitanque{/g} puede infligir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al tanque de batalla Leman Russ. Una vez dañado, su integridad no puede restablecerse. El tanque no puede ganar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} ni {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turnos extra{/g}. Es inmune a la mayoría de los efectos (tanto positivos como negativos).

languages.text: 只有{g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}反坦克炮弹{/g}才能对黎曼·鲁斯战斗坦克造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。坦克受损后，耐久度无法恢复。坦克无法获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，对绝大多数效果免疫（对正面、负面效果均免疫）。
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: 只有{g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}反坦克炮弹{/g}才能对黎曼·鲁斯战斗坦克造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。坦克受损后，耐久度无法恢复。坦克无法获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，对绝大多数效果免疫（对正面、负面效果均免疫）。

languages.text: Seuls les {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}obus antichars{/g} peuvent infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au char Leman Russ. Il est impossible de restaurer son intégrité une fois qu'elle est endommagée. Le char ne peut pas gagner de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} ni de {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}. Il bénéficie d'une immunité contre la plupart des effets (positifs et négatifs).
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: Seuls les {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}obus antichars{/g} peuvent infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au char Leman Russ. Il est impossible de restaurer son intégrité une fois qu'elle est endommagée. Le char ne peut pas gagner de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} ni de {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tours supplémentaires{/g}. Il bénéficie d'une immunité contre la plupart des effets (positifs et négatifs).

languages.text: {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}対戦車用シェル{/g}のみがレマン・ラス・バトルタンクに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。ダメージを受けると、その完全性は復旧できない。タンクは{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を受けることはなく、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得できない。ほとんどの効果（ポジティブおよびネガティブの両方）に対して耐性がある。
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}対戦車用シェル{/g}のみがレマン・ラス・バトルタンクに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。ダメージを受けると、その完全性は復旧できない。タンクは{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を受けることはなく、{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得できない。ほとんどの効果（ポジティブおよびネガティブの両方）に対して耐性がある。

languages.text: Nur eine {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Panzerabwehrgranate{/g} kann dem Leman-Russ-Kampfpanzer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügen. Wurde er beschädigt, kann seine Integrität nicht wiederhergestellt werden. Der Panzer kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g} erhalten. Er ist immun gegen die meisten (positiven und negativen) Effekte.
languages.original_text: Only an {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Antitank Shell{/g} can deal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to the Leman Russ battle tank. Once damaged, its integrity cannot be restored. The tank cannot gain {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turns{/g}. It is immune to the most effects (both positive and negative).

traits.locale_text: Nur eine {g|f:c64d0c490ac8402eb5a966344e3924c0}Panzerabwehrgranate{/g} kann dem Leman-Russ-Kampfpanzer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügen. Wurde er beschädigt, kann seine Integrität nicht wiederhergestellt werden. Der Panzer kann keine {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporären Wunden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzüge{/g} erhalten. Er ist immun gegen die meisten (positiven und negativen) Effekte.
